LanguageData.GeneRipper_KillConfirmation: Extracting {1} from {0} will kill them. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.GeneRipper_ExtractionHoursTooltip: The time it takes for the Gene Ripper to extract a gene, in hours.
LanguageData.GeneRipper_BlendingChanceTooltip: Probability for the Gene Ripper to leave behind nothing but pawn mush.
